definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † [[אֱמֶת]] n.f. firmness, faithfulness, truth (contr. for [[אֱמֶנֶת]] fr. [[אָמֵן]]) Ge 24:48 + 106 t.; sf. [[אֲמִתּוֹ]], [[אֲמִתְּךָ]] Ps 91:4 + 18 t.
reliability, sureness: [[דֶּרֶח אֱמֶת]] sure way Ge 24:48 (J); [[שׂכר]] [[אמת]] sure reward Pr 11:18; [[אות אמתּ]] sure token Jos 2:12 (J); [[זֶרַע אמת]] Je 2:21.
stability, con-tinuance: [[שׇׁלוֹם וֶאֱמֶת]] peace and stability Is 39:8 (= 2Ki 20:19) Es 9:30, Je 33:6, Zec 8:19, cf. [[שׁלום אמת]] Je 14:13.

faithfulness, reliableness: (a) of men [[אִישׁ אֱמֶת]] faithful man Ne 7:2; [[אנשׁי אמת]] Ex 18:21 (E); [[הָלַח בֶּאֱמֶת]] walk in faithfulness, faithfully 1Ki 2:4, 1Ki 3:6, 2Ki 20:3, Is 38:3 cf. 1Sa 12:24; of ´[[י]], [[בַּאֲמִתֶָּךָ]] Ps 25:5, Ps 26:3, Ps 86:11; [[עיר האמת]] Zec 8:3; of men Ps 45:5, Ps 51:8, 2Ch 31:20, 2Ch 32:1, Pr 29:14, Is 10:20, Is 42:3, Is 48:1; [[ובתמים]] ´[[בא]] Ju Jdg 9:16, Jdg 9:19, Jos 24:14; ´[[חֶסֶד וֶאֱ]] mercy and faithfulness Pr 3:3, Pr 14:22, Pr 16:6, Pr 20:28, Ho 4:1, & the phrase [[עשׂה חסד ואמת]] Ge 24:49, Ge 47:29, Jos 2:14 (J) 2Sa 15:20. (b) an attribute of God Ps 54:7, Ps 71:22, Is 38:18, Is 38:19, Is 61:8; [[נתן אמת]] Mic 7:20; [[עשׂה אמת]] Ez Eze 18:9, Ne 9:33; [[עשׂה חסד ואמת]] Ge 32:11 (J) 2Sa 2:6; [[רב]] [[חסד ואמת]] abundant in mercy and faithfulness Ex 34:6 (J) Ps 86:15; these attributes are also associated Ps 40:11, Ps 40:12, Ps 61:8, Ps 115:1, Ps 138:2, Is 16:5, Ge 24:27 (J); they are messengers of God to men Ps 57:4, Ps 85:11, Ps 89:15 cf. Ps 43:3; [[חסד ואמת]] ´[[כל ארחות י]] Ps 25:10; the faithfulness of God endureth for ever Ps 117:2; he keepeth it for ever Ps 146:6; it reacheth unto the skies Ps 57:11, Ps 108:5; it is shield & buckler Ps 91:4; he is [[אל אמת]] Ps 31:6 = [[אלהי אמת]] 2Ch 15:3; [[אֱמֶת]] is also associated with the divine [[ישׁר]] Ps 111:8; [[חֶדֶק]] Ps 85:12; [[חְדָקָה]] Zec 8:8; [[מִשְׁפָּט]] Ps 111:7; Je 4:2; & salvation Ps 69:14.

truth (a) as spoken: [[דבר אמת]] speak truth 1Ki 22:16, 2Ch 18:15, Je 9:4, Zec 8:16, Ps 15:2; ´[[דִּבְרֵי א]] Ec 12:10; [[אֱמֶת הַדָּבָר]] the thing is certainly true De 13:15, De 17:4; [[אִמְרֵי אֱמֶת]] = [[אמרים אמת]] Pr 22:21; [[הגה אמת]] Pr 8:7; ´[[הגיד א]] Da 11:2, [[אֲמִתְּךָ]] Ps 30:10; [[שׂפת אמת]] Pr 12:19; [[אֱמֶת]] it is true Is 43:9; [[האמת אתכם]] whether truth is with you Ge 42:16 (E) cf. Is 59:14, Is 59:15. (b) of testimony and judgment [[עֵד אֱמֶת]] true witness Pr 14:25; [[עד אמת ונאמן]] Je 42:5; [[משׁפט אמת]] Ez Eze 18:8, Zec 7:9; [[שָׁפַט אמת]] Zec 8:16. (c) of divine instruction [[כְּחָב אֱמֶת]] Da 10:21; [[תורת]] [[אמת]] Mal 2:6 cf. Ne 9:13; [[תורתך אמת]] Ps 119:142; [[בְּפִיךָ אמת]] ´[[דבר י]] 1Ki 17:24 cf. 2Sa 7:28; ´[[משׁפטי י]] [[אמת]] Ps 19:10; [[ראשׁ דברך אמת]] Ps 119:160; [[מחותיך]] [[אמת]] Ps 119:151. (d) truth as a body of ethical or religious knowledge Da 8:12; [[להשׂכיל באמתך]] Da 9:13.

definitions.title: 5. adv.
definitions.body: in truth, truly Ps 132:11; [[יהוה אלהים אמת]] Yahweh is God in truth, truly Je 10:10; elsewhere [[בֶּ ָאֱמֶת]] Ju Jdg 9:15, Ps 145:18, Je 26:15, Je 28:9, Je 32:41.
